Author: GitHub
Description:
In one of Africa's largest refugee camps, an incredible tech-for-good story is unfolding. See how UNHCR and the local community in Kakuma are using community-flown drones, AI, and open source tools on GitHub to create the first-ever detailed maps of their home. This vital data is the first step in building a sustainable future.
